name: @cosmic-plus/jsutils
description: Generic JavaScript utilities that are not related to Stellar
author: MisterTicot

scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.build-index: sed 's/^exports\.\(.*\) = require(\(.*\));$/export { default as \1 } from \2/' es5/index.js > es5/index.mjs
scripts.build: for i in es5 index; do npm run build-$i || return; done
